Well I -WAS- gonna read this thread...

>

Workin' on it~

> 
> lets make it over 9000!!!

hype yeah!
Go on LADS, we can do this!! Up the 'Stoke!

the 502 errors are a sign

Squad is trying to tell us that 1.0 won't be released until this thread hits page 502

Family is watching braveheart. Happens to be the screen i play KSP on as well....

braveheart is going to die as soon as it drops. Family is going to be pissed. All well.
I can only imagine how slow the website will be once released.

> 
> Well I -WAS- gonna read this thread...

Write speed is exceeding read speed here~
2 minutes till 1.0 (I hype)!? HYYYYYYYYYYPE!

> 
> Me need The hype at SUPER SAYIN 5!!!!!!

the hype is over 9000000000000000

Almost there ![op9PWrr.gif](http://i.imgur.com/op9PWrr.gif)

Now we are ready to head for the Horn,

Weigh, hey, roll an' go!

Our boots an' our clothes boys are all in the pawn,

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!

Heave a pawl, oh, heave away,

Weigh, hey, roll and go!

The anchor's on board an' the cable's all stored,

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!

Oh, man the stout caps'n and heave with a will,

Weigh, hey, roll an' go!

Soon we'll be drivin' her 'way up the hill.

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!

Heave a pawl, oh, heave away,

Weigh, hey, roll and go!

The anchor's on board an' the cable's all stored,

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!

Heave away, bullies, ye parish-rigged bums,

Weigh, hey, roll and go!

Take yer hands from yer pockets and don't suck yer thumbs.

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!

Heave a pawl, oh, heave away,

Weigh, hey, roll and go!

The anchor's on board an' the cable's all stored,

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!

We're outward bound for Vallipo Bay,

Weigh, hey, roll and go!

Get crackin', me lads, it's a hell of a way!

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!

Heave a pawl, oh, heave away,

Weigh, hey, roll and go!

The anchor's on board an' the cable's all stored,

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!

Heave a pawl, oh, heave away,

Weigh, hey, roll and go!

The anchor's on board an' the cable's all stored,

To be rollickin' randy dandy O!
